post.body: undressed? rly? may have to rethink not watching it... ;)
live long enough you'll have several sets of the same sizes that you'll have completely forgotten buying.
well, mr gruffudd is certainly an adorable poppet, i'll give you that.
@wilw no, when airing of grievances involves teenagers, then you get to laugh.
and then you can send it to them in repetitive DMs...
well gosh, david, let me remind you of my site! at least i'm not selling anything! ;)
baker & spice: best reason to pray for a cure for celiac disease.
expert knitter but probably not near you. stitch n bitch is a pretty good how-to for autodidacts.
some day you will be adults with your own damn apartment. sir and i didn't get roommate-free until we had kids.
rarely snows here, we thot corner cafe would be empty--not so. packed all week!
i'm sure everyone and his brother have told you about podsafe but just in case...podsafe...
yes i'm on livejournal
my forum's default icon is a cheez-it. an early critic said my writing was bad but apparently addictive, like cheez-its. et voila.
is "butter my bacon" some euphemism you crazy kids are using these days?
jailbait is No2's favorite bpal. i tell her, if anyone asks, just say it's bpal--she's 7.5!
thank you! it's my all-purpose avatar everywhere :)
@slagar woooo! :)
i second @advodude . advomatic can hook you up! :)
i follow almost everyone. some folks i don't because they overtweet or they're marketing something i'm not interested in.
in their defense, something to consider: you have their help now, you won't later. i know the urge to be on your own, but...
see if you can find stan freberg's old routine about filling up a lake w/hot chocolate. demonstration of the power of radio. :)
what are you testing?
mmmm...latkes. i take it not in bacon fat? (my favorite way, which i suppose makes 'em potato pancakes...)
MsGamgee's points story about Barik: The Butcher's Boy http://tinyurl.com/4abweo
MsGamgee's points story about Barik Beloved is in the scheduler for midnight PST--about an hour from now.
barik's story will be ready at midnight pst.
aagh, the dog will NOT LEAVE ME ALONE! I want to finish this!
barik's story @ 500+, another 500 to go, i think...
~300 words into MsGamgee's Barik story for tomorrow.
i'm just speechless: http://www.startreknewvoyages.com/
working on msgamgee's points story about Barik. *flail*
A's points story: goose fat: http://www.meilinmiranda.com/goose-fat WARNING: CHIBI KAWAII OVERLOAD! WARNING!
egads, i'm going to die of cute overload before i finish this story...
chapter 2 is loaded into the scheduler and will be live at midnight fri/sat. (that's -8 GMT.) on to chapter 3.
fyi: @ChrisTejeda 's interview of me is up at WFG: http://tinyurl.com/6uts3x
all right, it's off to the therapist to cry a lot. i finally ate something, too...
dammit i forgot to eat again...
must go to bed. rlly.
listening to @teh_neil read me + No2 the graveyard book...
bumpy going again on my server, guys, including DN. should be cleared up end of day.
